QuestData.Title: A Possible Link
QuestData.Description: Not long ago we sent an expedition to the east, where it was attacked by crazed furbolgs. One of the survivors described slaying one of them and its body expelling a dark slimy substance.$B$BFor thousands of years, the furbolgs in this region have been peaceful. It is possible that there is a link to the furbolgs' behavior and the dark energy we were able to detect earlier.$B$BBring me samples of the furbolgs' blood. You will find them to the east in the Rage Fang Shrine and the Heart's Blood Shrine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Windseer Grayhorn in Conquest Hold wants you to obtain 8 Crazed Furbolg Blood from the Furbolgs at Heart's Blood Shrine and Rage Fang Shrine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you obtained the blood samples, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: This blood carries the same taint as the slime you obtained earlier... this does not bode well, $n.
